post.description: This API allows the user to add peer details manually

get.description: Retrieves the details of a transaction based on DID and date range (on and after start date and before end date).

parameters.description: Filter by role as sender or receiver
parameters.name: Role

parameters.description: Start date of the date range (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
parameters.name: StartDate

parameters.description: End date of the date range (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
parameters.name: EndDate

get.description: Get count of incoming and outgoing txns of the DID ins a node.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a transaction based on its ID.

parameters.description: The ID of the transaction to retrieve

get.description: This API will get all data token belong to the did

get.description: This API returns FT token chain data for a given FT token ID.

200.description: Successful response with token chain data

get.description: This API will return nft token chain data

parameters.name: latest

get.description: This API will get all NFTs owned by the particular did

get.description: This API will get all NFTs deployed on the node
